changeSet.author: M_Zhivotovskiy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.technical_interval_member ( id int8 NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY( INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1 NO CYCLE), technical_interval_id int8 NULL, group_id int8 NULL, user_id int8 NULL, email_address varchar NULL, CONSTRAINT technical_interval_member_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) );
